name: migration
description: Runs the initial data migration from old hr/directory systems into this system

scripts.migrate: PGUSER=postgres PGHOST=localhost PGDATABASE=postgres PGPASSWORD=localhost PGPORT=5432 node index.js
scripts.alma: PGUSER=postgres PGHOST=localhost PGDATABASE=postgres PGPASSWORD=localhost PGPORT=5432 node lib/alma-compare.js
